name: Elderrest
description:
Short visual novel-esque town building game created in 48 hours for Wholesome Games Jam 2022!

In it's current state is a super short prototype as originally planned was a longer storyline in which you're helping grow your town through ~10 frequent visitors while simultaneously working to rebuild your zombie assistant after her body was stolen, leaving only her head!

We ended up biting off a little more than we could chew for a 48 hour jam as you can probably tell but for a team of three people doing their first Game Jam we're all super proud of it ! It's still cute proof of concept we may end up regrouping and returning too at a future time where we already have numerous other characters, stories, and mechanics planned!

Team:
@LotusPrynce -Programming

@Eldritchia - Art

https://linktr.ee/bakabrook - Music!
